metadata.name: HackTool - SharpEvtMute Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of SharpEvtHook, a tool that tampers with the Windows event logs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\sharpevtmute.exe')) AND lower(device.desc) = lower('sharpevtmute') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--filter "rule ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--encoded --filter \\\\"'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of SharpEvtHook, a tool that tampers with the Windows event logs
